name: Tevaera
intro: Gamified and decentralized metaverse on zkSync
introduce: Tevaera is one of the first gamified and decentralized metaverse on zkSync where players can experience, build, monetize, and govern digital islands while trading dynamic NFTs on TevaBazaar marketplace and playing an assortment of fun and rewarding arcade games. Tevaera citizens are called Tevans who grow with Tevaera while participating in a blockchain-powered economy using $TEVA, the metaverse utility token.
